## Voice.Listener.CallInvite type

Call invite event listener. This should be the function signature of an event listener bound to the [Voice.Event.CallInvite](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) event.

```typescript
type CallInvite = (callInvite: CallInvite) => void;
```
